title: LegalDocumentType
description: Identifying information for a legal document, e.g. Passport, Visa, etc.

allOf.description: The identifier of the legal document, e.g. Passport number, Visa number.

documentType.description: The type of document, e.g. Passport, Visa, National Registration Card.

issuingAuthority.description: The name of the organization that issued the document. E.g. American Consulate, UK Passport Authority.

issueDate.description: The date the document was issued.
